title: Cryptshrink
author: Cryptshrink
created_time: August 13, 2023, 10:34:16 PMLast edit: August 13, 2023, 11:04:52 PM by Cryptshrink
content: The Privacy 4 Web 3 Hackathon from the Oasis Network has seen a steady growth with now more than 500 Participants!This has been an incredible effort to build the future of the Web 3. Now with Cyberscope contributing with the expanse of Web3 Smart Privacy powered by the Oasis Privacy Layer, through 10 audit vouchers worth $1,000 each for all categories.Now with $40,000 in prizes for winners and $25,000 in grants for those projects that continue developing and launch post-hackathon.This is the chance to build something worth protecting, the future of privacy for the Web 3 and even beyond it. You have until September 13th to create something amazing. What are you waiting for?p4w3.devpost.com
